name: Space Ton (Android)
description:
Description

This is a game where you are the commander of a lonely satellite drifting through space where you encounter numerous obstacles.

Collect Fuel, Energy and Health bottles along the way to ensure you do not run out of resources

Avoid obstacles such as Broken Satellites, Asteroids and Rockets.

Your goal is to make it as far as possible in this dangerous galaxy and beat the boss!

Avoid Obstacles such as Asteroids

Buy PowerUps at the SHOP

DEFEAT THE BOSS!

CREDITS

Game made by Dev Adriko.

Dynamic Space Background from DinV Studio

Explosion Sprite from

JoyStick Pack from Fenerax Studios

If there any bugs in the game, feel free to email Dev Adriko at adrikodev@gmail.com
